name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: A course introducing the basic concepts of philosophy, including major philosophical thinkers and arguments.

name: Philosophy of Science
description: A course covering the philosophical questions raised by science, including the questions of objectivity, the demarcation problem, and the philosophy of scientific method.

name: Advanced Philosophy of Science
description: A more advanced course covering the history and methodology of philosophy of science, including Bayesian reasoning, statistical reasoning, and scientific realism.
